key.name: automount-manager
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to automount removable media.

key.name: bluetooth-applet
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to show a Bluetooth applet.

key.name: desktop-background
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to draw the desktop background.

key.name: display-config
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to provide the display configuration.

key.name: end-session-dialog
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to show the end session dialog.

key.name: idle-monitor
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used for user activity monitoring.

key.name: input-sources
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to manage keyboard layouts and input methods.

key.name: polkit
key.description: This is the same authentication agent that was provided by PolicyKit-gnome.

key.name: power-applet
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to show a power applet.

key.name: screencast
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to record the screen.

key.name: screenshot
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to take screenshots.

key.name: shell
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used as a shell.

key.name: sound-applet
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to show a sound applet. This is the same sound applet that used to be a part of GNOME Control Center.

key.name: workarounds
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will use workarounds to fix bugs.

key.name: fade
key.description: If set to true, then fade effect will be used to change the desktop background.

key.name: status-icon-bg-color
key.summary: The background color for the status icon.
key.description: This contains the background color for the status icon that is shown in the system tray.

key.name: status-icon-fg-color
key.summary: The foreground color for the status icon.
key.description: This contains the foreground color for the status icon that is shown in the system tray.

key.name: fix-app-menu
key.description: If set to true, then budgie-helper will force Gtk/ShellShowsAppMenu to FALSE. Disable if you want to use gnome-settings-daemon overrides in xsettings plugin for 'Gtk/ShellShowsAppMenu' property.

key.name: fix-button-layout
key.description: If set to non-empty string, then budgie-helper will force Gtk/DecorationLayout to value set by this setting. Set to empty string if you want to use gnome-settings-daemon overrides in xsettings plugin for 'Gtk/DecorationLayout' property.
